title: (x) Miller "High Life" logo - custom designed {Robert Trogman}
content:
I'm looking for the name of the miller high life font...not the miller part, but the "high life" words

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415212705im_/http:/typophile.com/files/miller_high_life_5356.jpg)
author: dsayler

comments.content: Logos are usually hand lettered and since this trade mark is registered it will not be found as a font.

You can get close by adding thorns to [Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415212705/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/friz_quadrata_bold_ot/?sample_text=HIGH%20LIFE&sample_size=74).
Also, [LFH Old Stock 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415212705/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/oldstock.shtml) is in the neighborhood.
